ygData.subject: RE: A reply to Brian
ygData.msgSnippet: Scragg, A human SK will have a tougher time than a human paladin if for no other reason than they re KOS in a lot more places.  Being evil really puts you at a
ygData.messageBody:
Scragg,

A human SK will have a tougher time than a human paladin if for no other reason than they're KOS in a lot more places. Being evil
really puts you at a disadvantage, especially at earlier levels. Sure, you do level faster, but on a per-encounter basis you're
going to be more powerful if you're a non-human.

And in general, I'm fairly confident that a dwarven or high elf paladin will fare much better than a human better (racial bonuses
are somewhat offset by exp penalty I believe).

Brian
